column1:
> üåø **Vegan & Dairy-free**
Recipe is using only soy milk and protein. This uses aquafaba in the base, and only one mid-sized banana. Healthy fat is provided by hemp seeds. Since there are no extra thickeners, the base is relatively fluid. It also leads to a rather watery melt, 1g of CMC or another stabilizer will prevent that. Process on *Sorbet*, [hold it shortly under running water](https://jhermann.github.io/ice-creamery/info/tips%2Btricks/#handling-of-icy-sides-bottom) *after* that. Then a scrape-down with compaction, and a respin. Rating: üòãüòãüòãüçå Directly after the respin, you get a ‚Äúsoft scoopable‚Äù consistency, smooth and crystal-free. It‚Äôs a tiny bit gritty ‚Äî from the hemp seeds? The banana flavor is very mild.

1. In an empty tub, blend the hemp hearts, banana, and aquafaba to a smooth puree.
 1. Then add all the other ‚Äòwet‚Äô ingredients.
1. Before freezing, let it rest in the fridge for at least 2 hours.
The [brand names] used are in brackets.

column13: *alternative:* 8g (additional) vegetable glycerin for a sober recipe
optional, for chewier texture and slower melting
